column3: Way back on the radio dial
column4: The fire got lit inside a bright-eyed child
column5: Every note just wrapped around his soul
column6: From steel guitars to Memphis,, all the way to rock and roll
column10: I can hear the ringin' of a beat up ol' guitar
column12: Keep on dreamin',, even if it breaks your heart.
column15: Downtown is where I used to wander
column16: Old enough to get there but too young to get inside
column17: So I would stand out on the sidewalk
column18: Listen to the music playin' every Friday night
column23: Some dreams stay with you forever
column24: Drag you around but bring you back to where you were
column25: Some dreams keep on gettin' better
column26: Gotta keep believin' if you wanna know for sure
column30: Keep on dreamin',, even if it breaks your heart
